    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String name, String skin, Position position, Zone zone, int health, int maxHealth, String behavior, int damage, Direction direction)
      Constructor of Enemy
      Parameters:
      name - the enemy's name
      skin - the enemy's skin
      position - the current position
      zone - the zone in which the enemy can move
      health - the current health
      maxHealth - the initial health
      behavior - the enemy's behavior
      damage - the damages the enemy can dealt to the player
      direction - the current direction the enemy faces

      public boolean willMove()
      Returns if the enemy has to move by randomly drawing a number between 0 and 100, the enemy has a 20% chance to move
      Returns:
      true if the enemy has to move otherwise false
